entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero with temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High zero with temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Monday 20 February 2023
